tool_description: Enter the text you want to encrypt along with the required parameters and get the encrypted text as a result
name: Ciphers
title: Ciphers

api_list.name: /caesar/cipher/{text}/{shifts}
api_list.description: This only responds with encrypted text. The text encrypted is the text sent by user

api_list.name: /caesar/decipher/{text}/{shifts}
api_list.description: This only responds with decrypted text. The text decrypted  is the text sent by user

api_list.name: /enigma/ciphers/{ring}/{position}/{text}
api_list.description: This only responds with decrypted text. The text decrypted  is the text sent by user
